title: Red Tiki
description: A quirky little web design studio in Perth, Australia. I got brought on board to help out with their front-end projects. The prefered weapon of managing content was Silverstripe, which was surprisingly easy to pick up. A pretty laid back agency with its own Tikibar and the best Friday afternoon cocktail hours.

title: Lululemon Athletica
description: Lululemon athletica is a yoga-inspired athletic apperal company, with stores worldwide. For this project I was brought in to work on a digital magazine. The HTML/CSS/JS were made so it would fit in their custom templating system.

title: FCV Interactive
description: Got brought on board to work on maintenance work on British Columbia tourism sites. These were HTML/CSS/JS updates and some bugfixes on Kentico templates. Mentionable technologies used: Grunt.js to test, compile, and build the site.

title: Longtail
description: Worked as a Front End Web Developer doing CSS, HTML and JavaScript. While at the same time keeping up to date with trending technologies. Making sure every site is responsive, accessible and up to date with modern standards.

title: Heyday
description: Got asked to be part of the team to realize a webshop and experience site for a local warehouse as a Front-End Web Developer. I did HTML, CSS & JavaScript.

title: BKA Interactive
description: Realized and maintained various sites as a Front-End Web Developer. I did HTML, CSS & JavaScript.

title: World Vision
description: Helped out with various sites as a Front-End Web Developer. I did HTML, CSS & JavaScript. Also did some Back-End to couple with their CMS Umbraco.

title: Colenso BBDO
description: Helped out with various sites as a Front-End Web Developer. I did HTML, CSS & JavaScript. Also created some newsletters using online services.

title: IN10 Communications
description:
Here I developed web projects using techniques such as CSS3, HTML5, PHP, Papervision3D, Sandy, Away3D, FLARToolkit, AJAX but generally Actionscript 3.0. And also the occasional Motion Graphics work using After Effects.
I also completed a 5 month internship during which I researched how Augmented Reality could be used as a new digital medium in marketing campaigns.

title: MTV Networks
description: During my 5 months internship I researched Interaction Design. Day to day activity included making flash banners, news letters and short running campaign sites for international brands like MTV, Comedy Central and Nickelodeon.
